item.title: Error?
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

But you must use this starter command:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“starter”)){
if(kitstarter >= 1)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " Has tried to has tried to get 2 starters!");

BufferedWriter bw = null;
try {
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“logs/blackmarks.txt”, true));
bw.write(playerName+" Tryed to Cheat, black mark! ");
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
blackmark +=1;
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage(“Error with black mark logging!”);
}
}

}
else if(kitstarter <= 0){

kitstarter +=1;
BufferedWriter bw = null;

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " Got their starter kit get your’s by typing ::starter");
addItem(995,200000000);
addItem(6583,1);
addItem(1053,1);
addItem(1055,1);
addItem(1057,1);
addItem(3140,1);
try {
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“logs/starters.txt”, true));
bw.write(playerName+" Got their starter pack ");
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage(“Error with stater pack logging!”);
}
}[/code]

[br][size=1]Posted on: 16-09-2007, 15:54:20[/size][hr]Then just add the folders I said. here:

[quote=“musicmad441, post:7, topic:156486”]Ok, go into your data folder, and add a text document called:

blackmarks

Then open your logs folder, then in their make a new text document and call it:

starters

Hope I helped.[/quote]

Thanks Dude.

Read full topic

item.title: Error?
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

Change it to:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter") && (starterKit == 0)) { addItem(995, 10000000); sendMessage("Start it off."); starterKit = 1;} else if(starterKit == 1) { sendMessage("LOL N33B"); playerHandler.messageToAll = "Report"+playerName+"for item duping!"; }
[br][size=1]Posted on: 16-09-2007, 15:54:20[/size][hr]Or this if you no how do add folders:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“starter”)){
if(kitstarter >= 1)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " Has tried to has tried to get 2 starters!");

BufferedWriter bw = null;
try {
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“logs/blackmarks.txt”, true));
bw.write(playerName+" Tryed to Cheat, black mark! ");
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
blackmark +=1;
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage(“Error with black mark logging!”);
}
}

}
else if(kitstarter <= 0){

kitstarter +=1;
BufferedWriter bw = null;

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " Got their starter kit get your’s by typing ::starter");
addItem(995,200000000);
addItem(6583,1);
addItem(1053,1);
addItem(1055,1);
addItem(1057,1);
addItem(3140,1);
try {
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“logs/starters.txt”, true));
bw.write(playerName+" Got their starter pack ");
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage(“Error with stater pack logging!”);
}
}
}[/code]
